songs.lyrics:
Yo! Yama! You know! Listen! Ae yo!

Ma hun yoddha sadhai ladi rahanchu
Barsaat ma badhi jhai aghi badinchhu
Shikhar chadirahanchu hera chaina kunai sankha
Hanumanko puchhar jhai jalaidinchhu lanka
Police aadmi rah danga, Laathi charge, banda rah hadtal
Julus masal jastai babaal hola cha rah kunai sawal
Josh ma Rajesh Hamal, aasurapper Bhanubhakta
Narayan Gopal ko swor, Laxmi Prasad Devkota ko sabda
Le pardinchhu chusta sawari thappa chha khel tabya
Roke ni chheke ni pugnechu mero gantabya
Ujyaalo failaune drabya, chhu ma atti nai ekohoro
Eklo choro sarvashrestha purva rah paschim serofero

Sabai tedho mero dimaag dedo malai baal
Khali tero mero farki herum por paraya saal
Ma hun sabai ko kaal namai mero Yamaraj
Tyesaile Budhha so shanti failaune chha karmakaj
Hudaichha dharmanash, karmanash, sarvanash sab samaaj
Man ma trash, man ko saas, jaldo laash
Sabai katputli ko sansar, yo khelauna ko bhandar
Sabai praviti ko janjal ma tai na tui ko angaar
Hera charai tira andhakar chha bato chinidaina
Jaha jau tara Nepal ko mato birsidaina
Bhitri aago chissidaina, Ajhai jwala futna baaki chha
Prajatantra aayo tara Nepali jutna baaki chha
Ko sanga kati hatti chha, tyo sangai teti saathi chha
[?] dekhi ekkaisau satabdi ko manis
Sukha khojchhau hami tah
Baru dukhai mai bachincha
Parivar rah sathibhai ko saath sampati bhanda maathi chha
Baaki chha jaba samma mero saash
Jari rahancha prayash
Palai rahancha yo aash
Line chhaina awakash
Gunjine chha yo awaaj
Har chowk ma
Sab galli tolma ghumi hidne ma yodda
songs.title: Yodda
